graphs.description: List of list of ints. Defines clique structures of multiple graphs.

thetas.description: MRF parameters. Default: None. If thetas and gammas are both None, MRf parameters will be sampled uniformly at random MRF in [-5,0)

repetitions.description: Number of runs per graph. Default: 1

shots.description: Number of samples per run. Default: 8192

layout.description: List of qubits. Default: None. Required when measurement_error_mitigation != 0.

measurement_error_mitigation.description: Whether to apply measurement error mitigation. Default: No mitigation (0). 1: CompleteMeasFitter, 2: TensoredMeasFitter.

optimization_level.description: The optimization level to run. Default: 3

Fidelity_mean.description: Mean MRF fidelity over all runs.

Fidelity_sdev.description: Standard deviation of MRF fidelity over all runs.

KL_mean.description: Mean Kullback-Leibler divergence over all runs.

KL_sdev.description: Standard deviation of Kullback-Leibler divergence over all runs.

SR_mean.description: Mean RUS success-rate for real part extraction over all runs.

SR_sdev.description: Standard deviation of RUS success-rate for real part extraction over all runs.

Depth_mean.description: Mean circuit depth over all runs.

Depth_sdev.description: Standard deviation of circuit depth over all runs.

all_results.description: A dictionary containing information about each specific run.

inputs.description: A dictionary of the serialized input keyword arguments. The type is Dict[str, Any].
